meanings.definition: A Belgian dish consisting of fish or chicken cooked in a broth with vegetables and cream.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious waterzoois with fish and vegetables for the guests.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best waterzoois with chicken and creamy broth.
meanings.sent3: At the fancy restaurant, they serve waterzoois fit for a king!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering waterzoois filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the waterzoois melted in my mouth, leaving a savory taste.
